===Overview===
The '''Bhadwuans''' are powerful mystics, directly descended from the [[Atlantis|Atlanteans]].They are able to fly and discharge of energy when they act in unison. They live in a mystical realm Bhadwuan and watched over the Savage Land for millennia.{{r|Ka-Zar Vol 3 1}}
===Events===
Some Bhadwuans awoke to change the Savage lands environment but was stopped by [[Ka-Zar]].{{r|Ka-Zar Vol 3 1}}
